FuncDef: The user command specifies the user name and password for remote login.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the login user name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The device allows you to log in to the FTP server by using another user name without exiting from the FTP client view. This command also establishes the FTP connection same as ftp command.
This feature is completely dependent on the FTP server's behaviour.
